org.devgateway.toolkit.forms.filters

Class UICacheControlFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.filters.FilterBase
      • org.apache.catalina.filters.ExpiresFilter
        • org.devgateway.toolkit.forms.filters.UICacheControlFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    @Component
 @Order(value=-2147483648)
public class UICacheControlFilter
extends org.apache.catalina.filters.ExpiresFilter
    Some resources from the UI (react) app that are located at /ui/static/** can be cached forever because the URL contains the hash of the contents. If content changes, then the URL will change as well.
